subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The Penguins’ Sidney Crosby, who missed more than 10 months after a concussion in January, collided with a teammate and took a heavy hit in a loss to Boston on Dec. 5.
snippet: The Penguins’ Sidney Crosby, who missed more than 10 months after a concussion in January, collided with a teammate and took a heavy hit in a loss to Boston on Dec. 5.
